title: As Trump Eyes Greenland, Denmark’s Leader Is Unsure How Long U.S. Will Be an Ally
summary_full: President Trump’s efforts to pry Greenland from Denmark show that “the old world order is now gone,” Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen warned in Berlin.
summary_public: President Trump’s efforts to pry Greenland from Denmark show that “the old world order is now gone,” Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen warned in Berlin.
